author: Marc Tschapek (@marqelme)
description: With the module you can retrieve and output detailed information about the attached disks of the target and its volumes and partitions if existent.
notes: In order to understand all the returned properties and values please visit the following site and open the respective MSFT class U(https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/hh830612.aspx)
doc.short_description: Show the attached disks and disk information of the target host

community.windows.win_disk_facts.examples:
- name: Get disk facts
  community.windows.win_disk_facts:

- name: Output first disk size
  debug:
    var: ansible_facts.disks[0].size

- name: Convert first system disk into various formats
  debug:
    msg: '{{ disksize_gib }} vs {{ disksize_gib_human }}'
  vars:
    # Get first system disk
    disk: '{{ ansible_facts.disks|selectattr("system_disk")|first }}'

    # Show disk size in Gibibytes
    disksize_gib_human: '{{ disk.size|filesizeformat(true) }}'   # returns "223.6 GiB" (human readable)
    disksize_gib: '{{ (disk.size/1024|pow(3))|round|int }} GiB'  # returns "224 GiB" (value in GiB)

    # Show disk size in Gigabytes
    disksize_gb_human: '{{ disk.size|filesizeformat }}'        # returns "240.1 GB" (human readable)
    disksize_gb: '{{ (disk.size/1000|pow(3))|round|int }} GB'  # returns "240 GB" (value in GB)

- name: Output second disk serial number
  debug:
    var: ansible_facts.disks[1].serial_number

bootable.description: Information whether the particular disk is a bootable disk.

bus_type.description: Bus type of the particular disk.

clustered.description: Information whether the particular disk is clustered (part of a failover cluster).

firmware_version.description: Firmware version of the particular disk.

friendly_name.description: Friendly name of the particular disk.
friendly_name.sample: Red Hat VirtIO SCSI Disk Device

guid.description: GUID of the particular disk on the target.

location.description: Location of the particular disk on the target.

model.description: Model specification of the particular disk.

number.description: Disk number of the particular disk.

operational_status.description: Operational status of the particular disk.

partition_count.description: Number of partitions on the particular disk.

partition_style.description: Partition style of the particular disk.

access_paths.description: Access paths of the particular partition.

active.description: Information whether the particular partition is an active partition or not.
active.returned: if partition_style property of the particular disk has value "MBR"

drive_letter.description: Drive letter of the particular partition.

gpt_type.description: gpt type of the particular partition.
gpt_type.returned: if partition_style property of the particular disk has value "GPT"

hidden.description: Information whether the particular partition is hidden or not.

mbr_type.description: mbr type of the particular partition.
mbr_type.returned: if partition_style property of the particular disk has value "MBR"

no_default_driveletter.description: Information whether the particular partition has a default drive letter or not.
no_default_driveletter.returned: if partition_style property of the particular disk has value "GPT"

shadow_copy.description: Information whether the particular partition is a shadow copy of another partition.

description: Size in bytes of the particular partition.

transition_state.description: Transition state of the particular partition.

allocation_unit_size.description: Allocation unit size in bytes of the particular volume.

drive_type.description: Drive type of the particular volume.

health_status.description: Health status of the particular volume.

label.description: File system label of the particular volume.

object_id.description: Object ID of the particular volume.

description: Size in bytes of the particular volume.
Remaining size in bytes of the particular volume.

type.description: File system type of the particular volume.

volumes.description: Detailed information about one particular volume on the specified partition.

partitions.description: Detailed information about one particular partition on the specified disk.

path.description: Path of the particular disk on the target.

description: Allocated size in bytes of the particular physical disk.

bus_type.description: Bus type of the particular physical disk.

can_pool.description: Information whether the particular physical disk can be added to a storage pool.

cannot_pool_reason.description: Information why the particular physical disk can not be added to a storage pool.
cannot_pool_reason.returned: if can_pool property has value false

device_id.description: Device ID of the particular physical disk.

friendly_name.description: Friendly name of the particular physical disk.

health_status.description: Health status of the particular physical disk.

indication_enabled.description: Information whether indication is enabled for the particular physical disk.

manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the particular physical disk.

media_type.description: Media type of the particular physical disk.

model.description: Model of the particular physical disk.

object_id.description: Object ID of the particular physical disk.

operational_status.description: Operational status of the particular physical disk.

partial.description: Information whether the particular physical disk is partial.

physical_location.description: Physical location of the particular physical disk.

serial_number.description: Serial number of the particular physical disk.

description: Size in bytes of the particular physical disk.

spindle_speed.description: Spindle speed in rpm of the particular physical disk.

supported_usages.description: Supported usage types of the particular physical disk.

unique_id.description: Unique ID of the particular physical disk.

usage_type.description: Usage type of the particular physical disk.

physical_disk.description: Detailed information about physical disk properties of the particular disk.

read_only.description: Read only status of the particular disk.

sector_size.description: Sector size in bytes of the particular disk.

serial_number.description: Serial number of the particular disk on the target.

size.description: Size in bytes of the particular disk.

system_disk.description: Information whether the particular disk is a system disk.

unique_id.description: Unique ID of the particular disk on the target.

access.description: Access of the particular virtual disk.

description: Allocated size in bytes of the particular virtual disk.

allocation_unit_size.description: Allocation unit size in bytes of the particular virtual disk.

available_copies.description: Number of the available copies of the particular virtual disk.

columns.description: Number of the columns of the particular virtual disk.

deduplication_enabled.description: Information whether deduplication is enabled for the particular virtual disk.

detached_reason.description: Detached reason of the particular virtual disk.

enclosure_aware.description: Information whether the particular virtual disk is enclosure aware.

fault_domain_awareness.description: Fault domain awareness of the particular virtual disk.

description: Footprint on pool in bytes of the particular virtual disk.

friendly_name.description: Friendly name of the particular virtual disk.

groups.description: Number of the groups of the particular virtual disk.

health_status.description: Health status of the particular virtual disk.

description: Inter leave in bytes of the particular virtual disk.

logical_sector_size.description: Logical sector size in byte of the particular virtual disk.

manual_attach.description: Information whether the particular virtual disk is manual attached.

media_type.description: Media type of the particular virtual disk.

name.description: Name of the particular virtual disk.

object_id.description: Object ID of the particular virtual disk.

operational_status.description: Operational status of the particular virtual disk.

parity_layout.description: Parity layout of the particular virtual disk.

physical_disk_redundancy.description: Type of the physical disk redundancy of the particular virtual disk.

physical_sector_size.description: Physical sector size in bytes of the particular virtual disk.

provisioning_type.description: Provisioning type of the particular virtual disk.

read_cache_size.description: Read cache size in byte of the particular virtual disk.

request_no_spof.description: Information whether the particular virtual disk requests no single point of failure.

resiliency_setting_name.description: Type of the physical disk redundancy of the particular virtual disk.

description: Size in bytes of the particular virtual disk.

snapshot.description: Information whether the particular virtual disk is a snapshot.

tiered.description: Information whether the particular virtual disk is tiered.

unique_id.description: Unique ID of the particular virtual disk.

unique_id_format.description: Unique ID format of the particular virtual disk.

write_cache_size.description: Write cache size in byte of the particular virtual disk.

virtual_disk.description: Detailed information about virtual disk properties of the particular disk.

availability.description: Availability and status of the device.

bytes_per_sector.description: Number of bytes in each sector for the physical disk drive.

description: Array of capabilities of the media access device.
For example, the device may support random access (3), removable media (7), and automatic cleaning (9).
List of more detailed explanations for any of the access device features indicated in the Capabilities array.
Note, each entry of this array is related to the entry in the Capabilities array that is located at the same index.

caption.sample: VMware Virtual disk SCSI Disk Device

compression_method.description: Algorithm or tool used by the device to support compression.

config_manager_user_config.description: If True, the device is using a user-defined configuration.

description: Name of the first concrete class to appear in the inheritance chain used in the creation of an instance.
When used with the other key properties of the class, the property allows all instances of this class
and its subclasses to be uniquely identified.

default_block_size.description: Default block size, in bytes, for this device.

device_id.description: Unique identifier of the disk drive with other devices on the system.

error_cleared.description: If True, the error reported in LastErrorCode is now cleared.

description: More information about the error recorded in LastErrorCode,
and information on any corrective actions that may be taken.

error_methodology.description: Type of error detection and correction supported by this device.

firmware_revision.description: Revision for the disk drive firmware that is assigned by the manufacturer.

description: Physical drive number of the given drive.
This property is filled by the STORAGE_DEVICE_NUMBER structure returned from the IOCTL_STORAGE_GET_DEVICE_NUMBER control code
A value of 0xffffffff indicates that the given drive does not map to a physical drive.

install_date.description: Date and time the object was installed. This property does not need a value to indicate that the object is installed.

interface_type.description: Interface type of physical disk drive.

last_error_code.description: Last error code reported by the logical device.

manufacturer.description: Name of the disk drive manufacturer.

max_block_size.description: Maximum block size, in bytes, for media accessed by this device.

max_media_size.description: Maximum media size, in kilobytes, of media supported by this device.

description: If True, the media for a disk drive is loaded, which means that the device has a readable file system and is accessible.
For fixed disk drives, this property will always be TRUE.

media_type.description: Type of media used or accessed by this device.

min_block_size.description: Minimum block size, in bytes, for media accessed by this device.

model.description: Manufacturer's model number of the disk drive.

name.description: Label by which the object is known. When subclassed, the property can be overridden to be a key property.

description: If True, the media access device needs cleaning.
Whether manual or automatic cleaning is possible is indicated in the Capabilities property.
Maximum number of media which can be supported or inserted
(when the media access device supports multiple individual media).

partitions.description: Number of partitions on this physical disk drive that are recognized by the operating system.

pnp_device_id.description: Windows Plug and Play device identifier of the logical device.

power_management_capabilities.description: Array of the specific power-related capabilities of a logical device.

description: If True, the device can be power-managed (can be put into suspend mode, and so on).
The property does not indicate that power management features are currently enabled,
only that the logical device is capable of power management.

scsi_bus.description: SCSI bus number of the disk drive.

scsi_logical_unit.description: SCSI logical unit number (LUN) of the disk drive.

scsi_port.description: SCSI port number of the disk drive.

scsi_target_id.description: SCSI identifier number of the disk drive.

sectors_per_track.description: Number of sectors in each track for this physical disk drive.

serial_number.description: Number allocated by the manufacturer to identify the physical media.

signature.description: Disk identification. This property can be used to identify a shared resource.

description: Size of the disk drive. It is calculated by multiplying the total number of cylinders, tracks in each cylinder,
sectors in each track, and bytes in each sector.
Current status of the object. Various operational and nonoperational statuses can be defined.
Operational statuses include: "OK", "Degraded", and "Pred Fail"
(an element, such as a SMART-enabled hard disk drive, may be functioning properly but predicting a failure in the near future).
Nonoperational statuses include: "Error", "Starting", "Stopping", and "Service".
"Service", could apply during mirror-resilvering of a disk, reload of a user permissions list, or other administrative work.
Not all such work is online, yet the managed element is neither "OK" nor in one of the other states.
State of the logical device. If this property does not apply to the logical device, the value 5 (Not Applicable) should be used.

system_creation_class_name.description: Value of the scoping computer's CreationClassName property.

description: Total number of cylinders on the physical disk drive.
Note: the value for this property is obtained through extended functions of BIOS interrupt 13h.
The value may be inaccurate if the drive uses a translation scheme to support high-capacity disk sizes.
Consult the manufacturer for accurate drive specifications.
Total number of heads on the disk drive.
Note: the value for this property is obtained through extended functions of BIOS interrupt 13h.
The value may be inaccurate if the drive uses a translation scheme to support high-capacity disk sizes.
Consult the manufacturer for accurate drive specifications.
Total number of sectors on the physical disk drive.
Note: the value for this property is obtained through extended functions of BIOS interrupt 13h.
The value may be inaccurate if the drive uses a translation scheme to support high-capacity disk sizes.
Consult the manufacturer for accurate drive specifications.
Total number of tracks on the physical disk drive.
Note: the value for this property is obtained through extended functions of BIOS interrupt 13h.
The value may be inaccurate if the drive uses a translation scheme to support high-capacity disk sizes.
Consult the manufacturer for accurate drive specifications.
Number of tracks in each cylinder on the physical disk drive.
Note: the value for this property is obtained through extended functions of BIOS interrupt 13h.
The value may be inaccurate if the drive uses a translation scheme to support high-capacity disk sizes.
Consult the manufacturer for accurate drive specifications.

ansible_disks.description: Detailed information about one particular disk.

ansible_facts.description: Dictionary containing all the detailed information about the disks of the target.
